mapper.insert: insert into SETTING (SNO, PRINT, WIDTH, HEIGHT, UNIT, COLUMN_NUM, COLUMN_GUTTER, ORIENTATION, MARGIN_TOP, MARGIN_BOTTOM, MARGIN_RIGHT, MARGIN_LEFT, BLEED_TOP, BLEED_LEFT, BLEED_BOTTOM, BLEED_RIGHT) values (#{sno,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{print,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{width,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{height,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{unit,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{columnNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{columnGutter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orientation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marginTop,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{marginBottom,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{marginRight,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{marginLeft,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{bleedTop,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{bleedLeft,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{bleedBottom,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{bleedRight,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.select: select SNO, PRINT, WIDTH, HEIGHT, UNIT, COLUMN_NUM, COLUMN_GUTTER, ORIENTATION, MARGIN_TOP, MARGIN_BOTTOM, MARGIN_RIGHT, MARGIN_LEFT, BLEED_TOP, BLEED_LEFT, BLEED_BOTTOM, BLEED_RIGHT from SETTING
